description: My place is close to Brooklyn Heights promenade, Cobble Hill, DUMBO, Brooklyn bridge & Brooklyn Bridge Park, Manhattan bridge, Boerum Hill.   The neighborhood is super cute and feels like no other place in the city, yet with all the nearby subway stations, you can be in the middle of Manhattan within 15 minutes.
name: Brooklyn Heights brownstone garden-level studio
review: Great little spot in a fantastic location! Steven was quick to reply to communications, and offered helpful suggestions for restaurants, coffee, and attractions nearby.
